title: Ala vENDum enrAl
sahitya:
Ala vENDum enrAl ahankArattai aDakki Ala vENDum manidA inidE


anupallavi

  kOLum porAmaiyum kuTTi-kalagam sheyyum tELukk-iDam koDuttAl dinam dinam koTTum kaiyai


caraNam    pAraik-kolai sheidu vIran enavE pEshum paDaiyeDuttE koDiyar kuDiyaik-keDukkum pAsham
Uraik-kavarvadu pOl uyiraik-kavarum nAsham uNDa vITTukkiraNDE unnum paDu mOsam
